div.p: Candidate should be able to develop and execute silicon characterization activities. The main responsibilities include developing automation scripts, driving volume data collection, gathering and summarizing large amount of data, and generating reports.

ul.li: Familiarity with JTAG interface, device physics and ASIC design flow
Experience with Matlab/R/gnuplots is a plus
Understanding of digital and analog design, being able to read Verilog is a plus

div.p: Develop automation scripts to test new silicons Bring up silicons in lab Collect volume data Build infrastructure to report live data summaries Prepare report from volume data
